personal.name: Ratan Singh
personal.tagline: Building digital experiences that make a difference
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with one years of experience creating web applications that solve real-world problems. I love turning complex ideas into elegant, user-friendly solutions.

projects.title: Hotel Booking System
projects.description: Hotel Booking System is a full-stack web app that allows users to search hotels, check real-time availability, and book rooms with secure payments. Features include role-based access (Guest, Staff, Admin), booking management, cancellations/refunds, and an analytics dashboard for occupancy and revenue.

projects.title: ShopSphere E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform that enables users to browse products, manage carts, and securely complete payments. Built with React 18, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript on the frontend, with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB on the backend. Features include user authentication with JWT, order management, payment gateway integration, and an admin dashboard for managing products and orders.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and historical weather data visualization.

projects.title: Car-Rental-Website
projects.description: A full-stack car rental platform with user authentication, vehicle booking, secure payment processing via Stripe, and real-time availability tracking.

projects.title: Image Gallery Application
projects.description: A responsive image gallery application built with React, featuring dynamic image rendering, category-based filtering, search functionality, and a modern UI styled with Tailwind CSS. Optimized for performance and seamless user experience.

projects.title: Wedding Management App
projects.description: A full-stack wedding planning application that helps couples and planners manage guest lists, schedules, and tasks with real-time updates and collaboration features.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developing and optimizing scalable web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring efficient CI/CD workflows to accelerate deployments.
achievements: Designed and implemented scalable backend architecture to handle high user traffic
Optimized application performance, reducing load time by 40%
Collaborated with a team of 5 developers on multiple high-impact projects

experience.title: React Developer Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of responsive web applications using React and Node.js, collaborating closely with design and product teams to deliver user-focused features.
achievements: Developed responsive web interfaces from scratch using React
Integrated third-party APIs and implemented payment gateway solutions
Increased unit test coverage from 60% to 90% through rigorous testing

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Assisted in the development of full-stack applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, ensuring responsive design and seamless backend integration.
achievements: Developed and integrated RESTful APIs with front-end applications
Converted Figma/PSD designs into fully responsive user interfaces
Implemented performance optimizations, improving load times by 30%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.institution: Gyan Sagar College of Engineering, Sagar
education.description: Graduated Magna Cum Laude with focus on software engineering and web development.
